definition[0]: if you do something as you go along, you do it without planning or preparing it
example[0]: He was making the story up as he went along.
example[1]: I never had formal training, I just learned the job as I went along.
definition[1]: to go to an event or a place where something is happening
example[2]: I might go along to the meeting tonight.
definition[2]: to happen or develop in a particular way
example[3]: Things seem to be going along nicely.
